div.p: 1. TRANSFER OF TITLE: The Seller agrees to transfer clear and marketable title to the Property to the Buyer upon receipt of the full purchase price.
2. PROPERTY CONDITION: The Property is sold in its current "as-is" condition. The Buyer has inspected the Property and accepts it in its present state.
3. PAYMENT DEFAULT: In the event of payment default, the Seller reserves the right to terminate this Agreement and retain any payments made as liquidated damages.
4. GOVERNING LAW: This Agreement shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the United Arab Emirates.
5. DISPUTE RESOLUTION: Any disputes arising from this Agreement shall be resolved through arbitration in accordance with applicable laws.
6. ENTIRE AGREEMENT: This Agreement constitutes the entire understanding between the parties and supersedes all prior negotiations, representations, or agreements.

ul.li: The Seller has good and marketable title to the Property, free from all encumbrances except as disclosed herein.

All property taxes and assessments have been paid to date.
The Seller has the legal authority to enter into this Agreement and transfer the Property.

p.strong: The Buyer represents and warrants that:

ul.li: The Buyer has the financial capacity to complete this transaction.
The Buyer has inspected the Property and accepts it in its current condition.
The Buyer has the legal authority to enter into this Agreement.
